bill_title: permit a county to file a lien against the property of the parents for payment of temporary care, temporary custody, shelter, or detention provided to a child.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to permit a county to file a lien against the property of the parents for payment of temporary care, temporary custody, shelter, or detention provided to a child. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 26-7A-94 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SUBDIVISION to read as follows: The county may file a lien on all property, both real and personal, of the parents, jointly or severally, of any child placed in temporary care, temporary custody, shelter, or detention if the county is responsible for the costs and if a judge has ordered repayment of all or part of the costs. The lien is enforceable pursuant to the provisions of chapter 23A-20. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
